text:
<@U11HH3P7Y> i published the latest versions of fabric-client and fabric-ca-client to npm, can you let me know what information you need to create a new CI that can be triggered manually to do the publish? at the minimum, it should be parameterize to take a branch name (for instance `v1.0-alpha`) and pull the latest from that branch, then:
`npm login`
`cd fabric-client & npm publish`
`cd fabric-ca-client & npm publish`
the only thing i haven’t found out is how to associate the packages to the hyperledger org. i believe it can be done by adding `—scope=@hyperledger` param to `npm login`, but i haven’t tried it
